record.dc:title: 112MM32, 15MM32, Montgomery County, Kentucky. Camargo Mounds Site. Profile 30R2 - 30L4.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Kentucky Adena and Woodland Mound Sites
record.wpa:narrative: The plank stake is 30. Humus showed from 30L1 to 30R2. The other line near floor of cut, marks the undisturbed soil. The old humus was very evident just above the line. The stain on the floor is due to humus. This old humus also marked a habitation level pre-dating the mound. Note sourwood stump on top of small mound.
